property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.ha.custom-ha-enabled
property.description: MapR Zookeeper based RM Reconnect Enabled. If this is true, set the failover proxy to be the class MapRZKBasedRMFailoverProxyProvider

property.name: yarn.client.failover-proxy-provider
property.description: Zookeeper based reconnect proxy provider. Should be set if and only if mapr-ha-enabled property is true.
